website_summaries.verdict: Quirks aside, this pair is ideal for enthusiasts of the brand who need waterproof boots but prefer the shorter, ankle-length style.
pros: The perfect Hunter rain boots for those who don't like tall boots that fit around the calf, as they offer a minimalist bootie fit
Suitable for days when tall rain boots are too much
cons: Ankle opening is somewhat narrow and may cause uncomfortable rubbing during the break-in period

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: The left boot developed a significant crack through the rubber within a few months of purchase. The right boot is starting to crack in the same location.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cut into your leg. Hard to size if you are a half size
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love these. I've seen them on other women and they look so cute. I tried them on around the house and they just kept cutting into my leg. I usually wear an 8.5 but these only come in whole sizes. I ordered both the 8 and 9. The 8 was too small - my toes hit the end. And the 9 was too big.
customer_reviews.author: Stlmom

customer_reviews.title: Pinches your ankles
customer_reviews.text: The boots are comfy. Besides that they constantly pinch your ankles. I was unaware that behind the elastic on the sides it was just a slit in the rubber. It pinches and rubs the whole time. They’re fine if you wear long socks or pants tucked into your boot. This picture was from one day of wearing them 😬
customer_reviews.author: Paige Giebel

customer_reviews.title: Love these Chelsea boots!
customer_reviews.text: I originally got the 6 because that's what my Hunter boots were, but the Chelsea boot 6 was considerably smaller. I sized up to a 7 and these fit perfectly. I have warn these a few times, and my feet AND ankles feel great! I have bad feet, and almost every shoe out there gives me some kind of discomfort, but my feet did really well in these boots. I haven't had problems with the boots digging into my ankles as has been reported. I just wear socks that go above the boot. Would definitely recommend this product. Go a size up and have socks.
customer_reviews.author: SCBS_1005

customer_reviews.title: So Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The first time I wore these boots was on a trip to New York City where we where on our feet all day. I was blown away by the comfort of these boots. My feet never hurt the entire trip and I still find this to be true 8 months later. I have no issue with them digging into my ankles, which was a worry. They are so lightweight and comfortable. Overall, a great boot that I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Harley Brown

customer_reviews.title: Well constructed, quality materials...
customer_reviews.text: I have the Original Short boot that have performed very well in Chicago's wet midwest climate. Order a half size up if you plan on wearing a heavier sock though. The Chelsea boot fits just as well but not as easy to slip on and off. It takes a little finessing to get your foot into the Chelsea boot even with the elastic side panels so quickly slipping them on and off at least when they are new won't be too easy. All in, they should perform well in derogatory conditions.
customer_reviews.author: KBPchicago

customer_reviews.title: OUCH
customer_reviews.text: These boots are cute, but they left me with scars around my ankles. I've tried to break them in over and over again, but I ended up bleeding and regretting it every time. My ankles are narrow, for what it's worth. I highly recommend you do NOT purchase these. I have a pair of J.Crew Chelsea rain boots that are far more comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: K. Crevasse

customer_reviews.title: Great Utility Boots
customer_reviews.text: Love these. They fit better than I expected after reading the reviews. Plenty of room for my toes. They’re comfortable enough to wear all day. They are snug around the ankle but not uncomfortable, I wear socks that come up above the boot.
customer_reviews.author: Debra A. Guzman

customer_reviews.title: Oh they fit alright...
customer_reviews.text: These fit like a rubber glove. Its a good thing that loop is on back of boot, you're going to need it to pull boot on. Not sure it water can get past that. I think my feet were damp just from sweating in boot. I ordered sizs 10, most of my other shoes are size 10 with except of few 9 1/2.
customer_reviews.author: prudence greenwood

customer_reviews.title: Wrong item in right box
customer_reviews.text: Opened the box expecting a black Hunter Chelsea as ordered as well as what the box indicated to find a pair of used Merona shoes. Nice quality control.
customer_reviews.author: Cooker103

customer_reviews.title: Amazing. Amazing. ❤️
customer_reviews.text: These boots are EXCELLENT quality. Sturdy, fit a little above the ankle, and have stretchy sides to fit snugly (very little slipping around once on). I was looking for sturdy boots that I can wear to work, but also out. The quality is great, I added the insoles for a little more arch support (as rain boots typically don’t have much arch support) and I love them even more! I got the hunter fluffy insoles and I am extremely satisfied with this purchase. I am sure these boots will last for many years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: Would not buy from this seller again. Boot is too small and narrow. I bought the boots as a gift for my sister’s birthday. By the time she got them and tried them on, the return period ended. Seller will not accept the $125 boots back. They’ve never been worn. Dissatisfied
customer_reviews.author: Bandjcarter

customer_reviews.title: So cute
customer_reviews.text: I've been wanting these boots for a while now, but the price kept me from buying. I finally gave in when they were about $20 off and got them and I love them. So far they are good...they are a little difficult to get on because of the narrow opening, but I use the fabric tab in the back to help that. They look good with whatever pants I have on. They do rub around the ankle sometimes but it hasn't been too big of a problem. I wear tall socks when wearing the boots.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 3 months
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these from Amazon thinking you could buy Hunter boots from Amazon. Mine only lasted 3 months before they had a bunch of cracks in them letting the water in. As I tried to get a replacement from Hunter I was told these boots are fake and not real Hunter boots and cannot be replaced under their 2 year warranty. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Alise Santiago

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love! I own two other “original” boots. So I knew the sizing. They are a little tough to get on and off the first couple times. But I think most boots are til they’re broke in. They do still rub my ankles a little But it’s starting to wear off. But I don’t care, I love these!! Ordered a Womens 8. I wear 8.5 normally.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Romano

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute :)
customer_reviews.text: I originally have the knee length Hunter boots but they’ve become too bulky for my liking and since there’s a buckle at the top it’s not comfortable to cross my legs. I bought these when it was on sale and I LOVE it. It’s super cute and practical. Just like what other reviews have said, the ankle portion is pretty tight so you’re going to have to maneuver your way in and out of the boot. But I find it comfortable once I’m wearing it.
customer_reviews.author: JN

customer_reviews.title: Kills your ankles
customer_reviews.text: Got my boots and initially loved them, wore them to the store, had them on walking around about 10 mins and my ankles were bleeding. The boots were rubbing so much that they broke skin. I had to go to the medical department and get band-aids so that I could finish my grocery shopping. I now have scabs along the back of both my ankles. If I didn't already wear them I would return them. I will be looking for some higher socks or something so that I can still wear them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: New favorite HUNTERS
customer_reviews.text: I have to say these are my favorite Hunters now. I have had the tall rain boots for years and I can only wear them for few hours at max. I’ve worn these two days in a row, straight out of the box (with a thicker sock) with not one issue. No sore feet, nothing. True to size, I do have small ankles so these hug my feet perfectly. Getting more colors!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Fit is very inconvenient
customer_reviews.text: I have worn them once. Had to use a shoe horn to get them on. Struggled to get them off. Not worth the money. Very stiff. They fit if you don’t mind all the work to wear them.
customer_reviews.author: R J Carlos

customer_reviews.title: Love them!!
customer_reviews.text: I am an 8.5/9 and I ordered a 9 since there are not half sizes. The boots fit perfectly. I was nervous because reviews mention how they are hard to put on. It was a little difficult the first couple of times, but after that it doesn't take me any longer now than regular shoes. They don't "slip on", but they are awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Ida

customer_reviews.title: 2nd Hunter Boot Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Nice ankle boot by Hunter. Somewhat difficult to get in/put on the first few wears. I used a shoe horn. Thinking the elastic/fabric will stretch some for ease of putting on one’s feet. Comfortable to wear and recommend a sock that comes to the ankle to keep boots from rubbing.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE!!! I wear these outside while gardening and doing yard work. They are the perfect height for keeping dirt out of my socks when wearing pants. They also clean up super easily and look new again.
customer_reviews.author: Skye

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Putting your foot in is tight, but not hard to put on! I have wide feet and a tall in-step and so it is snug on the top of my foot but fits everywhere else! I am size 7 1/2 and so I went up to an 8. It is a tiny bit too long, but not terrible. Great shoe for rain or snow, but in snow, it doesn't hold in ANY heat so your feet will get cold fast. I would totally buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Valenzuela

customer_reviews.title: Hurt my ankles
customer_reviews.text: I have always wanted a pair of Hunter Boots! I was so excited when they arrived... I immediately put them on and just walked around my house in them! Within just a few minutes my ankles began to hurt. The boots were fine except my ankles!! Is this normal? I’m afraid to wear for work or shopping. I’m going to send back. So disappointed 😢
customer_reviews.author: Donna Davis Yates

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is in love! I was worried about ordering these based on other reviews on comfort but my daughter insisted that she still wanted them. Glad I did because she is very happy with them. Can’t go wrong with Hunter!
customer_reviews.author: Krista M.

customer_reviews.title: Narrow fit
customer_reviews.text: I tried these after the mid calf boots fit too small. These also were very narrow at the opening and hard to pull on. I wear a wide shoe so maybe that's why. Too bad, because I really love the style. Just way too narrow for my foot.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: OUCH!!!! Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: Ouch!!!!!!!! Ankle rubbed raw all the way around both legs. Scabs galore. Very disappointed because the bootie itself is adorable. Just couldn’t make it work.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Cone

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for greeenhouse/outside work!
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots! They do start to squeak after time, even with various different sock types. If I were better about changing shoes throughout the week, they might of lasted longer than a year. Cracks on both shoes on outside/above toe area. I WORE them out tho. Would order again for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Need to break in a bit
customer_reviews.text: Stiff and rubbed my ankles the first time I wore them. Walked around the house with them on over thick socks. It did the trick! They fit fine now and I wear them often. Super cute! Size is true.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie W.

customer_reviews.title: Very narrow
customer_reviews.text: I asked a friend to try these on who wears a size smaller than I do, and neither of us could even get our foot in the shoe. However, returns were painless and I received a full refund. I would suggest trying these on in a store before purchasing a pair.
customer_reviews.author: Tia Bradford

customer_reviews.title: BALLER
customer_reviews.text: These are baller. I wear them all the time. I work in construction and am often on a job site and these keep me stylish but practical. No more changing my shoes before I step onsite. I also wear them to the grocery, running errands or just whatever. They are so comfortable and I don’t have issues with them rubbing on my ankles.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie McKechine

customer_reviews.title: Hate them. Rubs my ankles raw. Difficult to put on
customer_reviews.text: They rub my ankles raw even with pants on.. super difficult to get on. I hate wearing them.
customer_reviews.author: savana

customer_reviews.title: A Must Buy
customer_reviews.text: These are my new go to shoes when I need to leave the house in unideal weather conditions. They get the job done without looking as obnoxious as the taller ones (which I own as well and still highly suggest). They are much more comfortable then expected!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Quality of Boot
customer_reviews.text: I received these boots for walking to our barn and cleaning stalls. Loved the fit and look of them and was not hard on them, however, the right boot split on the side within a couple months. Could not understand how this would happen as they fit great and I was not hard on them and only wore them for two hours approx. 5 x a week. The split is so bad now the boots are toast. :-( Disappointed on the quality of the boot.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Rogers

customer_reviews.title: I love these boots!
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t worn them yet, but I can’t wait! I purchased the red and they are soooo cute! They look really nice on my feet. I wear size women 10 and they fit jus perfect. They did not feel snug or too tight. I have the taller Hunter boots and they run pretty big..these fit perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: Cute, functional & fun!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these boots! The fit is great, they are comfortable and keep my feet dry. The elastic on the side has a thread that has loosened but it's minor.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Crap
customer_reviews.text: Fabric totally peeling after just a couple wears. So disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Dlkillen

customer_reviews.title: Cute but rubs ankles
customer_reviews.text: It’s super cute and stylish, but it rubs against my ankles a lot so you have to be strategic when wearing these. Ankle socks are typically the answer.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Rainy season readiness
customer_reviews.text: The most comfortable rain boots I have ever worn. They are heavy and well made and showed up on time. I’m ready for rainy season in Florida!
customer_reviews.author: MstrssGrim

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Love these Booties. Only issue is that the top part of boot rubs against my ankle
customer_reviews.author: Earlene E.

customer_reviews.title: Lasted less than 2 months ... would like a refund ... but too late to return.
customer_reviews.text: Sadly, after wearing these boots for less than 2 months they developed cracks on the upper side at the balls of the feet. I need waterproof boots, and with cracks, they aren't waterproof. I wore these boots less than daily. Don't recommend purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Lelania Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Order 1 size up
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots, super stylish order 1 size up from your shoe size as these run small, especially around the ankles. If you have thick ankles they might not work for you as I imagine they would dig into the sides and make blisters - "wife"
customer_reviews.author: Hapakings808

customer_reviews.title: Really comfortable! (with tall socks!!)
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is only an ankle killer if you are not wearing tall socks. I was advised to order a size bigger and I am happy with my decision to do so! I think they would have fit okay if I had ordered my usual size but I am glad I ordered a size up! I can comfortably wear fuzzy socks with these and they have been amazing in all of this rainy and cold weather! I am very satisfied with my purchase. I get compliments on my black chelsea hunter boots all the time!!
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: Size up if you have wide ankles
customer_reviews.text: This product fit me perfect but I can see how the ankle area might hurt if they're a little wide. I suggest sizing up if you have wide ankles. I also suggest putting your fit in sideways (toes going in sideways) then turning once they're in because the ankle area is definitely fitted
customer_reviews.author: Alex & Freddy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent boot
customer_reviews.text: Was a gift and my granddaughter is thrilled with them! She said the boot runs a bit small so if between sizes suggest you order a size up. I had to exchange hers.
customer_reviews.author: Deb G

customer_reviews.title: Ripped after only a few months of wear
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved these boots, and we paid more to get a name brand, but after only 3 months of wear both boots ripped and leaked.
customer_reviews.author: Trenton Hill

customer_reviews.title: Order half sizes down
customer_reviews.text: Nice boots. If you’re a half size order down. I read some reviews to order up for thick socks but it was still way too big. Had to return and order a down.
customer_reviews.author: Jarrod W. Burton

customer_reviews.title: Super cute but recognize it for what it is
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots and think they are the perfect blend of fashion and function. The only downside is that where they hit on the ankle has a tendency to rub. It's manageable with the right pair of socks, but there have been a few times where thick rubber has rubbed on skin, leaving some impressive scabs.
customer_reviews.author: KJ

customer_reviews.title: Waiting for rain
customer_reviews.text: I can't wait to wear these. I've put them on, they fit great. It hasn't rained.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfect and serves it's purpose. Only complaint, if you are not wearing socks that are tallet than the boot, it will blister or cut your shin
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: Great and Delivered sooner than expected!
customer_reviews.text: Product was just as expected after reading reviews. Went up a size from the tall hunter boots I have and they fit great. The delivery was INCREDIBLY FAST! I wasn’t expecting them until a Thursday and they came on Tuesday! A great surprise!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy P.

customer_reviews.title: Cute and waterproof.
customer_reviews.text: Cute and waterproof. Wear a 7.5 but bought a 7 since they only come in whole sizes. They fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Spitz

customer_reviews.title: Found my favorite rain boot!
customer_reviews.text: These look great and are so comfortable. I wore them all day for 5 days, and had no pain whatsoever!
customer_reviews.author: D.Cheung

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic style and fit!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic boot for all wet weather!! LOVE the fit and they are comfy. Great boot!
customer_reviews.author: AlissaMarie Kmatz

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: first time did rub my ankle but felt better after that. I love these!
customer_reviews.author: Angelica Gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved these boots. She wears them all the time.
customer_reviews.author: BM

customer_reviews.title: Runs small
customer_reviews.text: Runs a size small, was very disappointed with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Gina Brown

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and cute!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE my hunter boots! Perfect for warmer days when you don’t wanna wear tall rain boots! They’re super comfy I’m on my feet most of the day and never have any issues when wearing these!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany G

customer_reviews.title: Cute but too tight on ankles!
customer_reviews.text: So cute BUT they are beyond tight on my ankles. I can barely get my feet in them without a struggle. I wore them for a few hours outside and my ankles hurt so bad because the rubber was pinching them. I'm hoping they stretch.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Glad I sized up!
customer_reviews.text: These are great, true Hunters & high quality. I’m glad I read reviews and sized up from my tall Hunter boots because these ones are definitely tighter on the foot. I wear a size 8 in my tall Hunters and ordered a 9 in these and they’re perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Eliana

customer_reviews.title: Now I have the driest feet.
customer_reviews.text: Love them, the elastic around the ankles is very secure so I’d recommend thicker socks.
customer_reviews.author: Terror

customer_reviews.title: Great Hunter Boots!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my daughter and she loves them! She wears them all the time with everything! Great quality that you expect from Hunter! Definitely worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Kippy

customer_reviews.title: Great rubber ankle boots
customer_reviews.text: Super fast delivery, exactly as described and fit true to size I wear them all the time when it rains
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Top quality, excellent construction. A bit pricey, but worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Christmas gift for my 16 y/o granddaughter. She absolutely loves them, wears them all the time. Beautiful fit, great traction in our snowy northwest climate.
customer_reviews.author: GrammaJoJo

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this product
customer_reviews.text: The boot fits my foot, and it doesn't hurt to walk in these boots for an extended period of time. The back of the boot does rub/ dig into the back of my ankle, but nothing major. Very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney S. Sheblessy

customer_reviews.title: Best boots ever
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots! They’re perfect for anything and not floppy whatsoever like most boots. It’s a little hard to put them on but once your foot is in you’re comfortable for the rest of the day. THE BOOTS WONT CUT YOUR ANKLE IF YOU WEAR LONG SOCKS! That’s all it takes. :)
customer_reviews.author: Cydnie Perry

customer_reviews.title: Perfect style and comfort
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t have to break them in much. They fit well with socks of course and were comfortable from the start and I do a lot of walking. They were also great for vacationing in rainy weather. They are water repellent, but I also sprayed them with 3m silicon spray for an extra protective coating.
customer_reviews.author: Martin

customer_reviews.title: Love these boots!
customer_reviews.text: Love the look of these! So far, no issues with cutting into ankles as others mention; I do have small ankles, however and wear socks to cover them. My only issue is they run a bit smaller so size up. I have the taller Hunter boots in a 7, but had to get these in an 8. Too bad they don't have half sizes... those would fit perfect
customer_reviews.author: V

customer_reviews.title: Too tight at the ankle
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love these; they're great looking. But unfortunately, all the reviews saying that they're uncomfortably tight at the ankle and just above the ankle are true.
customer_reviews.author: DuxMom

customer_reviews.title: Too tight and heavy.
customer_reviews.text: So tight they were difficult to get on They fit nothing like my original Hunter tall boots. Tight and very heavy. Will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: michael smith

customer_reviews.title: Order a half size larger in the short boot.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered same size short boot as long boot. Short boot is almost too tight to wear comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Mike W

customer_reviews.title: LOVE MY HUNTER BOOTS
customer_reviews.text: What’s not to love about the boots... great purchase, comfortable, tons of compliments when I wear the boots, I would buy again hands down
customer_reviews.author: Tuffie66

customer_reviews.title: Hunter boots are very well made
customer_reviews.text: They are very well made but my normal size 8 was too small so I ordered a 9 and they are a tad big but with socks they are fine. If you wear a half size then the next size up would be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted these boots to work out, but after wearing for 10 minutes I was forced to take off. They were so uncomfortable. Chaffed by ankles horribly!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with the shipping and packaging of this product. It came in the original box that was still shrink wrapped. Very good quality shoes. Difficult to get your foot in if you have medium to high arch but once your foot is in it fits perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality rain boots
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable!!! A bit tight around the ankle, but I love them!
customer_reviews.author: frances c hassett

customer_reviews.title: Perfect City Rain Boots
customer_reviews.text: Runs small, very happy I ordered a 9 when I usually wear a 8.5 or smaller. (Women’s US size) May be too tight for those with a wider then average ankle. Pacific NW city rain and country tested. Great grip and very comfortable. I’ve walked miles around the city, no discomfort or blisters. Wear socks above the shoe line or it will rub.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: CRUSHED 💔
customer_reviews.text: Uggghhh I wanted to lovethese soooo baaad. They just werent rightinthe ankle and they KILLED. I had to return them. So sad.
customer_reviews.author: Def not a robot

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and stylish
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and stylish. Work well if you have larger calves and don’t want to deal with trying to pull a full size boot up. Good for rainy days! They do run a little small would size up half size.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel B.

customer_reviews.title: Stylish...
customer_reviews.text: Great boots. Takes a couple of weeks to break them in, so expect a little feet pain. Not good for long walks. But they're not designed for that. Very happy
customer_reviews.author: Supplemena

customer_reviews.title: Take some breaking in.
customer_reviews.text: Ankle area was tight the first wear, and bruised ankles. Second wear was much better. Biggest issue is they are hard to get on. The ankle area is stretchy, but you need four hands to pull them on: 2 to hold the ankle area open and 2 to pull them on. Still love the look though.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Ouch!
customer_reviews.text: Omg the top around the ankle is going to rip your skin off. Through jeans and socks!!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Hartigan

customer_reviews.title: Never made it to me!
customer_reviews.text: Probably would have been great boots to give to my daughter for a xmas present except they never made it to me. Not sure where they are!
customer_reviews.author: Mic87v

customer_reviews.title: Love the color and fit
customer_reviews.text: I was worried as many reviews showed how tight the fit at ankle. I have thick ankles but I ordered size 7 (usually wear 7 1/2) and wear socks higher than boot and they fit great! The don’t hurt or rub at all.
customer_reviews.author: Butler Bulldogs

customer_reviews.title: Not easy to slip on and off
customer_reviews.text: It’s pretty tight to get on and off the foot because of the ankle width; however the ankle width looks cute. It is great quality and fits wonderfully otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick B.

customer_reviews.title: Not comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This boot has rubbed on my ankle and is so painful!! Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of the same boot. Love love them. I use superfeet insert and was able to pull out the insole and place my insert. They are a bit snug to get into but worth the effort
customer_reviews.author: Pete Gray

customer_reviews.title: Color & Fit are perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I love these. So glad I bought them. Excellent quality.
customer_reviews.author: florence fagnan

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: Ordered them in black, they came in green. Even the box says black on it 😭
customer_reviews.author: Savana

customer_reviews.title: Ankle pressure
customer_reviews.text: I am so disapointed. Will probably return them. The pressure on the outside ankle is intense. Am wearing them in the house to see if I can stand it but probably won't work. The seam where the elastic joins the rubber is right on my ankle bone (with sock).
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Pair of Rain Booties
customer_reviews.text: These Chelsea boots are the perfect addition for anyone who needs a little rain protection! They’re adorable, stylish, and fit as-expected. I’ve been wearing them for the past 5 days in Ireland and my feet have been comfortable and dry the entire time (with a pair of high socks- important so you don’t get blisters on your ankles!).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect 3 season boots for Ohio!
customer_reviews.text: Bout these boots as my taller ones I wear on the farm and wanted a nice pair for every day wear. These have been exactly what I was looking for. I ordered a 9 even though I’m an 8 1/2. They have plenty of room for thick socks, which you will need to keep your feet warm.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Hirst

customer_reviews.title: Order down.
customer_reviews.text: I wish it came in half sizes. I bounce between a 5.5 and a 6 but the six seems a little big. The calf room is tight so extra socks may not work. Still like the boots!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome boot!
customer_reviews.text: I love my Hunter boots! I read the reviews carefully and knew that I would need to wear thicker socks due to the reports of rubbing on the ankles and I have not had a problem! They are super cute and stylish and also great for rain and snow.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: Great boots
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these boots. They fit true to size and she is very happy with them. They look great too!
customer_reviews.author: Nadine F.

customer_reviews.title: Half sizes size up
customer_reviews.text: If you are a half size, take the half size up. The ankles are extremely tight and are basically impossible to take on/off. Once on, the rubber cuts into your ankles.
customer_reviews.author: barbara zhao

customer_reviews.title: I don't know how anyone wears these
customer_reviews.text: These are cute and were roomy enough in the toe. I really wanted to keep them. But they strangled my ankles and hurt and yes, cut into my lower leg. I seriously don't know who these fit. I'll be sad to return them.
customer_reviews.author: amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: great rain shoes for cruise to alaska
customer_reviews.text: excellent rain boots, yes they are pricey but should last forever or as long as I need them at least!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Peterson, MD

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I love the length. They are exactly what i wanted! Super comfortable too.
customer_reviews.author: Jacobe Conrad

customer_reviews.title: nice boot
customer_reviews.text: a squeeze to get foot in , but should loosen as I use it more it seems
customer_reviews.author: Holly W.

product_meta.title: HUNTER Original Chelsea
product_meta.description:
* Hunter Size Chart
 * Note: Select your US size. Please be advised, the product and box will display UK, US and Euro sizing. For US sizing, both men's and women's sizing is displayed. Men's sizing is represented by "M" and women's sizing is represented by "F". 
 * Exude confidence when you embrace the elements in style with the Hunter® Original Chelsea boot.
 * Waterproof natural rubber construction.
 * Pull-on design with rear pull tab.
 * Classic, round toe.
 * Dual goring panels offer easy wear.
 * Signature logo detail on the front.
 * Textile lining.
 * Cushioned, stationary insole.
 * Calendared rubber outsole.
 * Imported.
 * Measurements: *  Heel Height: 1 in
    *  Weight: 1 lb 4 oz
    *  Shaft: 5 in
    *  Platform Height: 1⁄4 in
   
   
 * Product measurements were taken using size 8, width M. Please note that measurements may vary by size.
 * Weight of footwear is based on a single item, not a pair.
